emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient 'løg' is a direct match for '1 stk løg'. This is the most accurate match as it represents the raw, unprocessed form of the ingredient.
The ingredient 'hvidløg' is a direct match for '3 fed hvidløg'. This is the most accurate match as it represents the raw, unprocessed form of the ingredient.

The ingredient 'risotto ris' is a type of rice. 'ris, parboiled' is the most appropriate match as it is a general category for processed rice, which risotto rice falls under. It is also the highest emission factor among the rice options.
The ingredient 'hvidvin' is a direct match for '2 dl hvidvin'. This is the most accurate match as it represents the ingredient itself.

The ingredient 'flåede tomater' directly translates to 'peeled tomatoes' and 'tomat, flået, konserves' is the closest match as it specifies peeled and canned tomatoes, which aligns with the processing of 'flåede tomater'.
The ingredient 'tomatpuré' is a direct match for 'tomatpure, koncentreret'. This is the most accurate match as it represents the concentrated form of tomato paste.

The ingredient 'grøntsagsbouillon' is a type of bouillon. While there isn't a direct 'vegetable bouillon' option, 'bouillon, hønsekød, spiseklar' is the closest general bouillon option available. Although it specifies chicken, it is a ready-to-eat bouillon, which is similar in processing to a vegetable bouillon. It is also the highest emission factor among the ready-to-eat bouillon options.

The ingredient 'soltørrede tomater i olie' is a processed form of sun-dried tomatoes. 'soltørrede tomater' is the most appropriate match as it represents the core ingredient, and the 'i olie' (in oil) part indicates a level of processing that aligns with the available options for sun-dried tomatoes.
The ingredient 'parmesan' is a type of cheese. 'parmesan ost, 32+' is a direct and accurate match for parmesan cheese, representing the specific type of cheese.
The ingredient 'øko citron' is a type of lemon. 'citron' is a direct and accurate match for lemon, representing the raw fruit.
The ingredient 'olivenolie' is a direct match for '1 spsk olivenolie'. This is the most accurate match as it represents the ingredient itself.

Burrata is a type of fresh Italian cheese, similar to mozzarella. Therefore, 'mozzarella ost, 30+' is the most appropriate match as it is a similar cheese product with a comparable production process and emission profile.
The ingredient 'pesto' is a direct match for '25 g pesto'. This is the most accurate match as it represents the ingredient itself.
The ingredient 'parmesan' is a type of cheese. 'parmesan ost, 32+' is a direct and accurate match for parmesan cheese, representing the specific type of cheese.
The ingredient 'basilikum' is a fresh herb. 'basilikum, frisk' is the most appropriate match as it specifies fresh basil, aligning with the raw form of the ingredient.
